channel.title: Comments for page "Copper Ring"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Copper Ring"

item.title: Value range
item.content:encoded: The value in the shop today for me was 25. In fact, the value of all my treasure items were 1 less than stated as the minimum value on this site. Someone may wish to edit these pages. I can't be bothered and don't know if I should anyway. Just thought I'd make the point here.
